sentences.en: a lamentable lack of support for the idea
sentences.cn: 这个想法令人遗憾地缺乏支持的状况

sentences.en: Being aimless and irresolute and hesitant is lamentable mentality.
sentences.cn: 毫无理想而又优柔寡断是一种可悲的心理.

sentences.en: Father Fauchelevent was rattling in the throat in the most lamentable manner.
sentences.cn: 车上的东西相当重,割风伯伯急得惨叫.

sentences.en: His command of English was lamentable.
His death is a lamentable loss of our work.
sentences.cn: 他的死对我们的工作来说是令人悲痛的损失.

sentences.en: His practice of inebriation was lamentable.
sentences.cn: 他的酗酒常闹得别人束手无策.

sentences.en: However lamentable also is medical health care is tasted.
sentences.cn: 然而可悲的也是医药保健品.

sentences.en: It is lamentable that the officer failed to deal with the situation.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，这位警官无法处理这一情况。

sentences.en: It is true but lamentable that Singaporeans generally respond well to stricter application of the laws.
sentences.cn: 严刑峻法一般上对新加坡人非常有效,这虽然令人感到泄气,却是事实.

sentences.en: She met Gerty's lamentable eyes, fixed on her in a despairing effort at consolation.
sentences.cn: 她看到葛泰在用无可奈何的悲伤目光安慰自己.

sentences.en: She shows a lamentable lack of understanding.
sentences.cn: 她显得缺乏理解能力，实在令人遗憾。

sentences.en: The decision they made is a lamentable lack of foresight.
sentences.cn: 他们做的决定实在缺乏远见.

sentences.en: The lamentable weakness of the words roused a motion of pity in Lily's breast.
sentences.cn: 这几句可悲的、懦弱的话打动了丽莉的慈悲心肠.

sentences.en: Things were now come to a lamentable height.
sentences.cn: 情形到了十分可哀的地步.

sentences.en: This is true, this is also a lamentable history!
sentences.cn: 这是真实的, 也是悲惨的历史!

sentences.en: This lamentable state of affairs lasted until 1947.
sentences.cn: 这一令人遗憾的事态一直持续至1947年。

sentences.en: Three years after this lamentable affair, Colonel Smith was arrested.
sentences.cn: 在令人痛惜的事件三年之后, 史密斯上校被逮捕了.
